name: Casefile: Magical Girl Mauler
description:
Detective Oroka is hot on the case as he trys to figure out who the person going around killing cosplayers and lolitas is. He has three days until they strike again.

--

Hi im a team of one (With help from @hibichoi on twitter for character design and ending CGS) so this was a hard thing for me, please be kind. if the game breaks i am gonna update it i just had to upload what i had to make the jam in time
